name: Jillybean
description: Jillybean is described as being an upbeat and happy hybrid, with flavors of tangy orange and mango. This strain is a top choice for creative minds and social butterflies looking for unencumbered euphoria during daytime hours. Bred by crossing Orange Velvet and Space Queen, Jillybean often expresses herself in deep hues of maroon on the leaves.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Paranoid
